original_text: and as soon as those bearing the ark had come as far as the Jordan, and the feet of the priests bearing the ark were dipped in the brink of the water (now the Jordan overflows all its banks throughout the time of harvest),
korean_text: 요단이 곡식 거두는 시기에는 항상 언덕에 넘치더라 궤를 멘 자들이 요단에 이르며 궤를 멘 제사장들의 발이 물 가에 잠기자

sentences.original_text: and as soon as those bearing the ark
had come as far as the Jordan,
and the feet of the priests bearing the ark
were dipped in the brink of the water
(now the Jordan overflows all its banks
sentences.korean_translation: (요단 강은 제 양쪽 강가를 모두 넘나는데
